Rabies
30, 31 post-exposure vaccination and immunoglobulin are effective. Prevention with dog immunization is effective.
There is practically no human-to-human rabies transmission.
Worldwide, the disease burden is significant, with 15 million cases per year.
Without treatment, rabies is always fatal (CFR = 100%).
Worldwide, mortality was 17,400 per year in 2015.

In 2013, no cases were reported in the European Union, but 3 were reported in the European Economic Area (Russian Federation).
